column2: Details which devices people own. The number (%) represents the percentage of the population that owns the indicated device
Details how people use each type of device.  The number (%) represents the proportion of the population that uses the device for each purpose.
Details the location where respondents use each device.  The number (%) shows the proportion of the population that uses the device in each room.
A tab that consolidates Ownership, Usage and Which Room in one table that's easier for data viz tools to use.
